items.name: broken dagger
description: It used to be a so-so blade, but it has been abused and neglected.
You might make use of it in a pinch, but your fists would likely be more effective.

items.name: notched dagger
description: A plain, working-man's dagger with a worn leather-wrapped handle. It has mostly been used
to cut meat at the dining boards, but can slice a man's throat if the need arises.
However, it could do with some quality time on the whetstone...

items.name: Excaliboar
description: This sword was forged by a true master bladsmith. It bears a family crest on the hilt--a rampaging boar
on an orange field bordered with gold. In the hands of a skilled warrior, this sword will
bring its wielder much honor and glory, or much gold if he is less skilled and just sells it.

items.name: heavy mace
description: This sword was forged by a true master bladsmith. It bears a family crest on the hilt--a rampaging boar
on an orange field bordered with gold. In the hands of a skilled warrior, this sword will
bring its wielder much honor and glory, or much gold if he is less skilled and just sells it.

items.name: leather cap
description: This ragged piece of boiled leather was custom-fit to a person with a very large head.

items.name: potion
description: A small flask containing a murky red liquid. It smells awful, but the label reads
"Heals minor cuts and abrasions." Don't expect it to work miracles.

items.name: old bottle
description: A dusty bottle of summer wine. It has never been opened

items.name: large gold skeleton key
description: An ornately fashioned skeleton key wrought from iron but plated in gold.
